TestGroupDocumentation.Title: totalDigits3 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a totalDigits-3.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType with totalDigits value 9.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger totalDigits-3.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls totalDigits-3-1.xml document which specifies valid value -2 for the nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-totalDigits-3 element, sets the values: -999999999, -100000000, -10000000, -1000000, -100000, -10000, -1000, -100, -10, -1, 0 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger totalDigits-3.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls totalDigits-3-1.xml document which specifies valid value -2 for the nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-totalDigits-3 element, sets the values: -1000000000, 100000000, 999999999, 1 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger totalDigits-3.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-totalDigits-3 type, sets the values: -999999999, -100000000, -10000000, -1000000, -100000, -10000, -1000, -100, -10, -1, 0 and expects the validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger totalDigits-3.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-totalDigits-3 type, sets the values: -1000000000, 1, 100000000, 999999999 and expects validation to fail.
